name: vbXpert
overview:
vbXpert hosts high-profile clients that have drastically different needs than others. Their focus is geared towards eliminating the need to charge a vBulletin site-owner per equipment, costly upgrades, and basic services. Capitalistic intent will be geared towards audience growth when proper ad monetization and content reach is the center of attention.

Every year new websites, forums, fads, social networking tools, and other dynamic applications emerge from the Internet. With 8 years of experience in all levels of vBulletin management, vbXpert has been diligent in establishing pricing models that gauge the true value of high-profile communities

For a pricing strategy to be effective for vendors, more consideration is typically given to a complicated process of distinguishing hardware value in relation to your needs. To offset this complexity, considerably minimizing hardware as a pricing metric for those that attract audiences, allow more flexibility for growth and stability.
